title: 56  Kurt Schwitters, Nivea, 1936/37
publication_title: The Modern Series at the Art Institute of Chicago
content:
<section class="osci-tk-epub-section tombstone" id="tombstone">56  
Kurt Schwitters (German, 1887–1948)  
Nivea  
1936/37  
Collage composed of cut and pasted papers with touches of gouache, on tan wove card, tipped to tan wove card; 180 × 147 mm (object); 233 × 203 mm (support)  
Gift of Albert Robin, 2005.421

</section><section id="figures">Kurt Schwitters, Nivea, 1936/37.

</section>
